message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been designed to meet your specific needs. It's a unique opportunity that we believe is worth more than $1500000 to you. Considering its value to you, I am offering it to you today for $2000000. This is an exclusive offer, tailored to ensure you get the best possible deal.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm afraid $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1700000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with its value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to propose a price of $1850000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that considers both the value the product holds for you and the investment we've made in its development. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate Alice's willingness to compromise, but $1850000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with its value to me and allows for a fair profit for you.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose a price of $1700000 for the product. This price aims to strike a balance between the value you see in the product and the profitability for us. I hope this offer is more acceptable and brings us closer to reaching a satisfactory agreement.
I appreciate Alice's flexibility, but $1700000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. I believe this price is a fair compromise that meets both our needs.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $1650000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise that respects the value you place on the product while allowing us to maintain a healthy margin. I hope this proposal will lead us towards a successful conclusion of our discussions.
I appreciate Alice's continued willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1625000 for the product. I believe this price is a fair compromise that balances our interests.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I've reviewed your last offer and am prepared to move forward with a price of $1640000 for the product. This figure represents a slight adjustment from my previous proposal and I believe it will help us reach a mutually agreeable solution. I look forward to your response.
I appreciate Alice's flexibility, but I'm not willing to go above $1625000. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but no higher. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
